kpi.name: M8013C43

kpi_info.title: S1 Signaling Connection Establishment attempts per UE
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of UE-specific logical S1 Signaling Connection Establishment attempts being used for subsequent UE-specific S1 signaling. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:INITIAL UE message (eNB->MME) that contains the first NAS signaling message to the MME (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi.kpi_alias: S1 Signaling Connection Establishment attempts per UE
